item.title: Implementing Pipeline from the SciKit Learn Module

item.title: Implementing LDA in Python
item.description: Definition Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) is a modelling technique used for NLP. I’m following along on this kaggle notebook to learn and explain these two techniques. Code I have uploaded the jupyter file here. And that’s how you do it. I’m not entirely sure how it works yet either, but I am learning!
